channel.title: [508] how to change the teleport of the skill when you click on it?
channel.description: subject explains it all, how do i change the coords of the skil you click on?

item.title: [508] how to change the teleport of the skill when you click on it?
item.dc:creator: @f_2_p_2_p_f f 2 p 2 p f
item.description:
@f_2_p_2_p_f wrote:

io>packets>Actionbuttons.java
Then search for something like this

case 125: //Attack p.setCoords(2851, 3548, 0); /* if(!p.leveledUp[0]){ p.skillMenu = 1; p.frames.setConfig(p, 965, 1); } else { lvlup = true; p.frames.setConfig(p, 1230, 10); } */ break;
Then simply change the coords in that case to what you want.

Read full topic
item.source: [508] how to change the teleport of the skill when you click on it?
